EmailTemplate.subject: What Could eCommerce Look Like at The Fresh Market?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At The Fresh Market, you know your brand better than anyone. Your brand quality is what keeps your customers coming back – and turns your new customers into loyal ones. But with your current solution, don’t you worry about losing your connection with your customers? In comes NCR Freshop. NCR Freshop will enable you to take your unique in-store experience and translate it online, taking the in-store experience and delivering it with consistency in a digital world. Built with retailers like you in mind, NCR Freshop: - Delivers personalized web and mobile ordering - Provides a seamless pick-up and delivery process - Gives you full control over pricing, brand experience, and your data - Makes it easy and quick to update product info and data - Integrates with existing loyalty and promotions See what NCR Freshop can do for you. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions?
